citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A written program of veterinary care with a current attending veterinarian for the facility has not been completed and kept
up to date. According to the facility representative, the facility currently uses the services of multiple local veterinarians.
The written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits by the attending veterinarian ensures that the facility
has a program to follow, and all animals have adequate veterinary care. Each dealer and exhibitor shall employ an
attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant
arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits
to the premises. The written Program of Veterinary Care in consultation with the facility's current attending veterinarian
must be made available for review.

There was one shelter structure provided for the two wolves, Naikaya and Tama, housed outdoors in enclosure #4 which
was not large enough to adequately accommodate both animals at the same time. A shelter that is too small does not
afford protection from inclement weather and may cause discomfort for the animals within the enclosure. Natural or
artificial shelter appropriate to the local climatic conditions for the species concerned shall be provided for all animals kept
outdoors to afford them protection and to prevent discomfort to such animals.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 08/24/2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license fee and
must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
Additional Inspectors:
ALEXANDRA ANDRICOS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
